title: GET_PICKLIST_FIELD_OPTIONS
description: Returns a list of options for the specified picklist field on a given object.

parameters.name: field_name
parameters.description: The name of the picklist field on the specified object. Non-picklist fields return an empty list.

examples:
GET_PICKLIST_FIELD_OPTIONS("Case","Priority")
-- Returns the picklist options for Case.Priority (e.g., ["High", "Medium", "Low"]).

tips.text: If the specified field is not a picklist, this function will return an empty list.
